mapper.select: select COUNT(*) as lineCnt from fct_info where line_no = #{lineNO}
select * from fct_info order by fct_cd
mapper.update: UPDATE fct_info SET fct_phs = '대기' WHERE line_no IN (select line_no from prd_prc_mng where instr_no in (SELECT M.instr_no from PRD_PRC_MNG M where M.now_phs = '라인가동종료' AND work_fin_dt > to_date(sysdate,'yy-MM-dd')-2)) AND prc_cd IN (SELECT prc_cd from prd_prc_mng WHERE instr_no IN (SELECT M.instr_no from PRD_PRC_MNG M where M.now_phs = '라인가동종료' AND work_fin_dt > to_date(sysdate,'yy-MM-dd')-2))

UPDATE fct_info SET fct_phs = '가동' WHERE line_no IN (select line_no from prd_prc_mng where work_str_dt is not null and work_fin_dt is null) AND PRC_CD IN (select prc_cd from prd_prc_mng where work_str_dt is not null and work_fin_dt is null)
mapper.select: select dtl_nm as fctNm from adm_bas_dtl_cd where dtl_cd like '%' || substr(#{fctCd},0,11) || '%'
SELECT (sysdate-7) as fixFrom, sysdate fixTo FROM dual
mapper.update: UPDATE fct_line SET TOT_PDT_AMT = #{totPdtAmt}, UPH_PDT_AMT = #{uphPdtAmt}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, EMP_NO = #{empNo} WHERE LINE_NO = #{lineNO}
mapper.select: select fct_cd , fct_nm , line_no ,prc_cd,(select FN_GET_PRC_CD_TO_NM(prc_cd) from dual) as prc_nm , fct_std FCT_MODEL,COMP_CD,USE_PURP,IN_DATE, PURCH_COST,CHK_PROD,CHK_PROD_UNIT,FCT_PHS,FCT_IMG,UPLOAD_PATH from fct_info where line_no=#{lineNo}

select f.fct_cd, f.fct_nm, f.line_no, f.prc_cd, f.fct_std, f.comp_cd,f.fct_model, f.use_purp, to_char(f.in_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') in_date, f.purch_cost, f.chk_prod, f.chk_prod_unit, f.fct_phs, f.fct_img, f.upload_path, a.prc_nm as prcNm from fct_info f join adm_prc_mng a on f.prc_cd = a.prc_cd where 1=1
and substr(f.fct_cd,1,11) = #{checkPrcCd}
AND f.in_date <= to_date(#{fixTo}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND f.in_date >= to_date(#{fixFrom}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
